page.title: 20LIFE STYLE -GIRL
page.content: On Saturdays I usually wake up at about 7 o'clock but I go back to sleep until 10.Then I get out of bed and have a light breakfast.My friend and I walk down to Looe.If its a nice day,we go straight to the beach,sunbathe for a while and when we are warmed up,go into the sea.We usually meet some other friends down there and we stay nattering with them for quite a time. We then go to a cafe and have something to eat.Afterwards we just walk around the town and perhaps go into the shops or the arcade.At the end of the afternoon,we make our way up the hill to my house. After tea we sometimes go to Looe again to wander around,but if there's something good on,we watch the box. Sometimes my friend goes home,but more often she stays the night with us.
